Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time for 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to lead to any subsequent activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average resolution time of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' for cases where it leads directly to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' for cases ending with 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time for 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Payment Handled' across all variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average waiting time to the next activity after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases where the next activity is 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases successfully concluding with 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases of initial rejection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time it takes 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to be followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in successful cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
